narrative.title: Xxx Corps - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: British Armoured Corps deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Open desert south of Gazala Line. Rocky desert and sand dunes. Terrain favors mobile armoured warfare but fuel consumption high in soft sand.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter
